00027                    kMissingAdcBlock,        // 1

00030                    kBadConfigData,          // 4

00058     return _errorBits != 0;

00204   static const char *getErrorName(unsigned int bit_i) {
00205 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00206     assert ( bit_i < kNErrorBits );
00207 #endif
00208     return __name[bit_i];

00219   bool getBit(unsigned int bit) const {
00220     return _errorBits & (1<<bit);
00221   };
00222 
00225   void setBit(unsigned int bit) {
00226     _errorBits |= (1<<bit);
00227   };
